Package com.nrifintech.cms.controllers

Class CartController

java.lang.Object
com.nrifintech.cms.controllers.CartController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/cart/") public class CartController extends Object
> This class handles requests to the `/cart` endpoint

  • Method Details

    • addToCart

      @PostMapping("addtocart/{userId}") public Response addToCart​(@PathVariable Integer userId, @RequestBody List<CartItemUpdateRequest> reqs)
      It adds the items to the cart
      Parameters:
      userId - The id of the user whose cart is to be updated.
      reqs - List of CartItemUpdateRequest objects
      Returns:
      A Response object is being returned.

    • updateQuantityIncrease

      @PostMapping("updatequantity/inc/{itemId}/{factor}") public Response updateQuantityIncrease​(@PathVariable Integer itemId, @PathVariable Integer factor)
      It increases the quantity of a cart item by a factor
      Parameters:
      itemId - The id of the cart item to be updated.
      factor - The amount by which the quantity is to be increased.
      Returns:
      A Response object.

    • updateQuantityDecrease

      @PostMapping("updatequantity/dec/{itemId}/{factor}") public Response updateQuantityDecrease​(@PathVariable Integer itemId, @PathVariable Integer factor)
      It decreases the quantity of a cart item by a factor
      Parameters:
      itemId - The id of the cart item to be updated.
      factor - The amount by which the quantity is to be decreased.
      Returns:
      A Response object.

    • removeFromCart

      @PostMapping("remove/{cartId}/{itemId}") public Response removeFromCart​(@PathVariable Integer cartId, @PathVariable Integer itemId)
      > Removes a cart item from a cart
      Parameters:
      cartId - The id of the cart you want to remove the item from.
      itemId - The id of the item to be removed from the cart.
      Returns:
      A Response object.

    • removeFromCart

      @PostMapping("clear/{cartId}") public Response removeFromCart​(@PathVariable Integer cartId)
      It clears the cart by removing all the items in the cart
      Parameters:
      cartId - The id of the cart to be cleared.
      Returns:
      A Response object.

    • getCart

      @GetMapping("getcart/{cartId}") public Response getCart​(@PathVariable Integer cartId)
      It returns a cart with the given cartId.
      Parameters:
      cartId - The id of the cart you want to get.
      Returns:
      Response object

    • getCart

      @GetMapping("getcart") public Response getCart​(Principal principal)
      It gets the cart of the user who is logged in
      Parameters:
      principal - This is the user object that is passed to the controller.
      Returns:
      A cart object
